page.title: 11ATTITUDES
page.content: Most people came to Toward because of their jobs.Although Toward doesn't supply many jobs the nearby town of Dunoon does.Quite a number of people who don't want to live in Dunoon live in Toward where it is peaceful. Everbody we questioned enjoys living in Toward because there isn't any crime and it's a nice little village beside the sea. The average length of time people have stayed in Toward is 4 years and most people came from cities which possibly shows that most people moved to Toward to get away from the city. Most people hope unemployment will decrease and have sound reason to do so as the unemployment figure stands at ..... {ATTITUDES (CONT) PAGE 12.
